name: Sam SOTO, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent

parties: Sam SOTO, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 24th day of September, 2008, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
957 A.2d 229
Sam SOTO, Petitioner v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent.
No. 72 EM 2008.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 24, 2008.
